ORIGAM Documentation : IsInRole

Created by Petr Hrehorovský, last modified by Tomáš Vavrda on Feb 02, 2016

Returns true if the currently logged-in user has the given application role assigned.

NAMESPACE

xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions"

SYNTAX

string IsInRole(string roleName)

PARAMETERS

roleName

Name of the role.
